title: Invalid receipt array RLP
body:
**Version**: Version: 1.7.0-unstable

**execution:** curl http://localhost:8545 -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0x9e09e1b8ed525feff415d5ad80a5fa5c2bcf35561f4b1a084c4534a29e8626ad"],"id":1}'

Error is as follows

ERROR[08-24|19:42:41] Invalid receipt array RLP                hash=0eddaf…a8a375 err="rlp: input string too long for bool, decoding into ([]*types.ReceiptForStorage)[0](struct { PostState []uint8; Failed bool; CumulativeGasUsed *big.Int; Bloom types.Bloom; TxHash common.Hash; ContractAddress common.Address; Logs []*types.LogForStorage; GasUsed *big.Int }).Failed"
ERROR[08-24|19:42:41] Receipt refereced missing                number=4194205 hash=0eddaf…a8a375 index=71
ERROR[08-24|19:42:41] goroutine 18309 [running]:
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/rpc.(*Server).serveRequest.func1(0xc421537760, 0x5199520, 0xc429409180)
	/Users/guowenbin/work/Go/go-ethereum/build/_workspace/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/rpc/server.go:135 +0x11e
panic(0x4a0ef80, 0x5269f10)
	/usr/local/go/src/runtime/panic.go:489 +0x2cf

	/usr/local/go/src/reflect/value.go:302 +0xa4
